name: py-cwl-upgrader

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Common Workflow Language standalone document upgrader

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-schema-salad
dependencies.description: Schema Annotations for Linked Avro Data (SALAD)

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-cwl-utils
dependent_to.description:
Python Utilities and Autogenerated Classes for loading and parsing CWL
v1.0, CWL v1.1, and CWL v1.2 documents.
